engagement_grid._comment: G1: Who was engaged and how

engagement_descriptions.people_who_use_drugs_other: CPR/Narcan Administration Trainings. Anonymous needle take back program.
engagement_descriptions.people_in_recovery_other: We are partnering with our new Police Chief to create a substance use task force. The Chief was very involved in the task force in his previous municipality.
engagement_descriptions.families_impacted_other: One on one support. Provided resource information.
engagement_descriptions.subject_matter_experts_other: Attended various trainings, meetings, webinars on various aspects of prevention, harm reduction, treatment, and recovery.

disparities_assessment.barriers: In our rural community, barriers include; stigma, transportation, income, providers, resources and education for people with substance use disorder and their families.

behavioral_health_assessment._comment: G3: How behavioral health needs were assessed
behavioral_health_assessment.admin_data_sources: Pre and post surveys were utilized to evaluate increase in knowledge for CPR/Narcan Administration trainings.
behavioral_health_assessment.other_methods: One on one encounters. Grief Support Groups. Interviews with first responders. Official complaints to the Health Department.
behavioral_health_assessment.barriers: The most impactful barrier has been recruiting subject matter experts to form a task force. We now have representatives from both Fire and Police as well as a new Principal at our technical high school who are eager to be involved. With an official task force in place, collaboration will move us forward in developing programs and strategies.

existing_programs.other_methods: Our newly formed task force will review existing responses and plan to expand on after overdose response to client and family.

practices.name: Educational speaker for high school students
Develop an after overdose response strategy

planning.process: Our municipality conducted its own planning process. We contracted a consultant to support this process. We consulted with Care Mass.
planning.care_mass_activities: Developed criteria for prioritizing needs and gaps based on findings

treatment.barriers: We are a rural community. Lack of services and transportation is a barrier. We will be working with our local technical high school in the future. We have a speaker (Chris Herren) planned for Januaury 2025.

how_spent: Increase availability of naloxone and other drugs that treat overdoses for first responders...
Provide training and education regarding naloxone...
Approve and fund syringe service programs...
Promote efforts to train health care providers...

criminal_justice.barriers: Lack of buy in from pervious first responder leadership.

pregnant_parenting.barriers: We do not have hospitals in our town. This subject would be covered by post partem care.

additional_comments.general: Thank you for the support. These funds allow us to develop new programs.
additional_comments.unmet_needs: We are in the assessment/planning phase. TBD.
additional_comments.orrf_recommendations: We will be able to respond to this question next year.
